Source.Name: polkit-qt-1
Source.Description: polkit-qt-1 aims to make it easy for Qt developers to take advantage of polkit API. It is a convenience wrapper around QAction and QAbstractButton that lets you integrate those two components easily with polkit.

Package.Name: polkit-qt-1
Package.Description: polkit-qt-1 aims to make it easy for Qt developers to take advantage of polkit API. It is a convenience wrapper around QAction and QAbstractButton that lets you integrate those two components easily with polkit.
